snippet.title: Briefly: Rick And Morty Recap, Facebook AI Scare, Bitcoin Explosion
snippet.content:
Brief news items of note for Lifehacker readers, including: the truth behind Facebook's "Skynet" AI, Rick And Morty episode 2 recap, Bitcoin reaches near-record highs.
A neuroscientist who studies decision-making has revealed the most important choice you can make. []
Here's a recap to Rick And Morty Season 3, episode 2. []
Bitcoin is rallying to near-record highs ahead of its deadline for a new trading platform. []
In recent weeks, a story about experimental Facebook machine learning research has been circulating with increasingly panicky, Skynet-esque headlines. Here's what actually happened. []
